locations.title: Molo Beverello
locations.des: We start our trip from the famouse place Jemaa Lefna in center of Marrakech, Crossed the highest Atlas Through pass (Tizi N Tichka)

locations.title: Marina Piccola
locations.des: so we will visit the UNESCO World Heritage Site Ait Benhaddou / Official name Ksar of Ait-Ben-Haddou is located in south of Morocco, It is an ighrem (fortified village in English) (ksar in Arabic), along the former caravan route between the Sahara and Marrakech in present-day Morocco. Most citizens attracted by the tourist trade live in more modern dwellings in a village on the other side of the river, although there are four families still living in the ancient village. Inside the walls of the ksar are half a dozen (Kasbahs) or merchants houses and other individual dwellings,

locations.title: Blue Grotto
locations.des: Pass trough the Ait Saouen Col in anti atlas

locations.title: Villa San Michele
locations.des: Crossed by the Draa valley, where there is more than 2 million palms along the draa river which stretches for a length to Senegal to the south.

list: Full-day tour of Capri island from Naples or Sorrento Admire views along the coast as you cruise to the island by jetfoil
Visit the lively island towns of Anacapri and Capri Ride
The funicular from La Piazzetta to Marina Grande Marvel at natural wonders like the Blue Grotto Small-group tour ensures a personalized experience

included: Shared boat ride tour around the island ( if Blue grotto is closed)

point: Hotel Il Faro, Via Marina Piccola, 5, 80067 Sorrento NA, Italy

locations.title: Molo Beverello
locations.des: We start our trip from the famouse place Jemaa Lefna in center of Marrakech, Crossed the highest Atlas Through pass (Tizi N Tichka)

locations.title: Marina Piccola
locations.des: so we will visit the UNESCO World Heritage Site Ait Benhaddou / Official name Ksar of Ait-Ben-Haddou is located in south of Morocco, It is an ighrem (fortified village in English) (ksar in Arabic), along the former caravan route between the Sahara and Marrakech in present-day Morocco. Most citizens attracted by the tourist trade live in more modern dwellings in a village on the other side of the river, although there are four families still living in the ancient village. Inside the walls of the ksar are half a dozen (Kasbahs) or merchants houses and other individual dwellings,

locations.title: Blue Grotto
locations.des: Pass trough the Ait Saouen Col in anti atlas

locations.title: Villa San Michele
locations.des: Crossed by the Draa valley, where there is more than 2 million palms along the draa river which stretches for a length to Senegal to the south.

locations.title: Molo Beverello
locations.des: We start our trip from the famouse place Jemaa Lefna in center of Marrakech, Crossed the highest Atlas Through pass (Tizi N Tichka)

locations.title: Marina Piccola
locations.des: so we will visit the UNESCO World Heritage Site Ait Benhaddou / Official name Ksar of Ait-Ben-Haddou is located in south of Morocco, It is an ighrem (fortified village in English) (ksar in Arabic), along the former caravan route between the Sahara and Marrakech in present-day Morocco. Most citizens attracted by the tourist trade live in more modern dwellings in a village on the other side of the river, although there are four families still living in the ancient village. Inside the walls of the ksar are half a dozen (Kasbahs) or merchants houses and other individual dwellings,

locations.title: Villa San Michele
locations.des: Crossed by the Draa valley, where there is more than 2 million palms along the draa river which stretches for a length to Senegal to the south.

hotels.title: Chic Urban Living in The heart of Ho Chi Minh City

overview.description: Opposite Durban’s famous beachfront, Blue Waters Hotel is within walking distance of the Suncoast Casino and the iconic Moses Mabhida Stadium. Both uShaka Marine World and Greyville Racecourse are within 2.5 mi from the property.@The spacious rooms and suites feature LCD TVs along with coffee-and-tea-making facilities. Each is equipped with air conditioning and a work desk. There is also plenty of luggage storage space. Most rooms come with furnished balconies and offer a view of the Indian Ocean.@Guests at Blue Waters can enjoy afternoon tea and cake in the Florida Lounge overlooking the ocean. The Versailles Restaurant provides buffet and á la carte service for lunch and dinner.@Leisure facilities at the Hotel Blue Waters include an indoor swimming pool, sauna and a squash court. There is also an outdoor rooftop swimming pool and guests can enjoy drinks with sunset views at the rooftop bar.@The Durban North Beach area is a good location for walking, running and cycling. Hotel Blue Waters is 5 minutes’ drive from the Durban ICC and 10 minutes’ drive from Durban’s city center. Durban Station is 1.2 mi away, while King Shaka International Airport is 19 mi from the property.@Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip.@We speak your language!

information: Security deposit will not be collected at this hotel

hotels.title: Saigon Sky Garden Hotel

overview.description: Saigon Sky Garden là khách sạn cao cấp với không gian xanh, hồ bơi, và phòng tập thể dục hiện đại. Mang đến trải nghiệm lưu trú đẳng cấp tại trung tâm Phú Nhuận.

information: Có bãi đậu xe miễn phí

reviewsTour.title: The best experience ever!
reviewsTour.des: It was excellent! The trip is long but the vans are comfortable and have wi-fi. The driver very friendly as well as Ahmed our guide to the dromedaries. The camp was beautiful, comfortable beds, clean bathroom and delicious food!

reviewsTour.title: Wonderful desert adventure
reviewsTour.des: I really enjoyed this tour. The views were breathtaking and the sunset over the dunes was unforgettable. The food was good, and our guide was very knowledgeable.

reviewsTour.title: Magical journey!
reviewsTour.des: The whole experience felt like a dream. Riding camels through the golden sand and spending the night in the camp was a highlight of my trip. Great hospitality too!

reviewsTour.title: Nice but too touristy
reviewsTour.des: The scenery was amazing but the camp felt a bit too modern for a desert experience. I was expecting something more authentic. Still had a good time overall.

reviewsTour.title: Perfect from start to finish
reviewsTour.des: Everything was perfectly organized. From the pickup to the drop-off, I felt taken care of. The camp was clean, and the night sky was just amazing.

reviewsTour.title: Great value for the price
reviewsTour.des: This tour exceeded my expectations. The team was friendly, and the experience was truly immersive. A bit cold at night, but the blankets were warm enough!

reviewsTour.title: Such a peaceful escape
reviewsTour.des: This tour helped me disconnect from the busy city life. The landscapes were stunning and our guide made the whole trip feel personal and unique.

reviewsTour.title: Beautiful scenery, nice people
reviewsTour.des: The trip was well organized, the locations we visited were beautiful and relaxing. A bit of waiting time at some spots but overall very enjoyable.

reviewsTour.title: Truly memorable
reviewsTour.des: From the moment we started, everything felt magical. Great energy from the group and staff, and the stops along the way were full of culture and charm.

reviewsTour.title: Great for nature lovers
reviewsTour.des: I was surprised by how much I enjoyed this tour. The views were absolutely stunning and the pace was just right.

reviewsTour.title: One of the best days ever
reviewsTour.des: Every stop on the tour was magical. The food was fresh, and the guides were knowledgeable and fun.

reviewsTour.title: Great tour, minor issues
reviewsTour.des: I loved the scenery, but the transport wasn’t very comfortable. Still, the experience was worth it.

reviewsTour.title: Good vibes and beautiful spots
reviewsTour.des: The guide created such a good atmosphere, and we got to visit hidden gems that weren’t crowded.

reviewsTour.title: Lovely short escape
reviewsTour.des: A quick but sweet getaway. The highlight was the boat ride — super relaxing and peaceful.

reviewsTour.title: Good but too short
reviewsTour.des: The tour was okay, but I wish it was longer. Felt like we were rushing through some of the places.

reviewsTour.title: Everything I hoped for
reviewsTour.des: Great service, great people, and unforgettable experiences. Highly recommend this tour!

reviewsTour.title: Fun and informative
reviewsTour.des: The guide gave us so much interesting info about the history and culture. Definitely worth the money.

reviewsTour.title: Expected more
reviewsTour.des: It was okay, but I didn’t feel it stood out compared to other tours I’ve done.

reviewsTour.title: Nice getaway with friends
reviewsTour.des: Took this with a few friends and we had a blast. Loved the hiking parts!

reviewsTour.title: Exceeded expectations
reviewsTour.des: I wasn’t expecting much, but this ended up being one of my favorite travel memories.

reviewsTour.title: Best escape to nature
reviewsTour.des: Absolutely serene. Waking up to the sound of birds and a gentle breeze was everything I needed.

reviewsTour.title: Nature at its best
reviewsTour.des: Loved the hiking trail and the picnic by the lake. Our guide was super chill and patient.

reviewsTour.title: Okay experience
reviewsTour.des: The place was beautiful, but I expected a bit more activities. Still, a good day overall.

reviewsTour.title: Affordable and nice
reviewsTour.des: For the price, this tour was fantastic. Clean transport, on-time, and friendly staff.

reviewsTour.title: History and food!
reviewsTour.des: We got to explore old ruins and try local dishes — both were amazing. Loved every part of it!

reviewsTour.title: Could be better
reviewsTour.des: It was okay. Some places were crowded, and the guide seemed in a rush.

reviewsTour.title: Urban adventure
reviewsTour.des: This city tour was packed with hidden gems. The street food stop was the best surprise!

reviewsTour.title: Great energy
reviewsTour.des: From the local markets to the sunset rooftop, everything was vibrant and exciting.

reviewsTour.title: City lights and sights
reviewsTour.des: Perfect for those who like fast-paced discovery. You won’t get bored, that's for sure.

reviewsTour.title: Romantic escape
reviewsTour.des: Booked this for our anniversary and it couldn’t have gone better. Sunset views were breathtaking.

reviewsTour.title: Relaxing weekend
reviewsTour.des: The spa part was a surprise bonus! Totally worth the money for a weekend away.

reviewsTour.title: Not bad, but not wow
reviewsTour.des: Pretty view, but service could have been better. Still got some great photos.

reviewsTour.title: Thrill seekers' dream
reviewsTour.des: Ziplining through the forest was such a rush! If you love adrenaline, this one’s for you.

reviewsTour.title: Lots of action
reviewsTour.des: Rock climbing and kayaking were my favorites. The staff ensured everyone was safe and having fun.

reviewsTour.title: Fun and safe
reviewsTour.des: Was nervous at first but the guides were amazing. By the end, I didn’t want to leave!

reviewsTour.title: A fairy tale come true
reviewsTour.des: Visiting ancient castles and hearing the legends from our guide gave me chills. Truly magical.

reviewsTour.title: History alive
reviewsTour.des: The medieval villages were like stepping back in time. Great storytelling and beautiful spots.

reviewsTour.title: Enriching journey
reviewsTour.des: Great for history buffs. I learned so much and the photos came out stunning!

reviewsHotel.title: Good but a bit loud
reviewsHotel.des: Staff were friendly and location was great, but the walls were thin and I could hear my neighbors.

reviewsHotel.title: Highly recommend!
reviewsHotel.des: Everything was top-notch — the breakfast buffet, the staff, the spa. I would absolutely stay again!

reviewsHotel.title: Wonderful service
reviewsHotel.des: The concierge went above and beyond to help us plan our local activities. The room was spotless.

reviewsHotel.title: Warm and welcoming
reviewsHotel.des: It felt like home. The fireplace in the lounge was such a nice touch for chilly evenings.

reviewsHotel.title: Great for a weekend escape
reviewsHotel.des: The atmosphere was peaceful and the garden area was beautiful. A perfect place to unwind.

reviewsHotel.title: Affordable and clean
reviewsHotel.des: The room was simple but very clean. The location made it easy to explore nearby attractions.

reviewsHotel.title: Decent but not impressive
reviewsHotel.des: Wi-Fi was a bit slow and the breakfast options were limited. Staff was helpful though.

reviewsHotel.title: Nice and quiet
reviewsHotel.des: The bed was really comfy and the AC worked great. Slept like a baby!

reviewsHotel.title: Mountain paradise
reviewsHotel.des: Waking up to that mountain view every day was unforgettable. Totally worth it!

reviewsHotel.title: Peaceful retreat
reviewsHotel.des: Quiet, clean, and surrounded by nature. A great break from city life.

reviewsHotel.title: Nice stay
reviewsHotel.des: Could use a little renovation, but staff made the stay pleasant.

reviewsHotel.title: Exceeded expectations
reviewsHotel.des: Superb hospitality, delicious meals, and a cozy room. Would return in a heartbeat.

reviewsHotel.title: Ideal for couples
reviewsHotel.des: Perfect romantic getaway. The fireplace and view sealed the deal.

reviewsHotel.title: Staff made the difference
reviewsHotel.des: They helped us with everything, from booking taxis to restaurant reservations. Very attentive.

reviewsHotel.title: Alright stay
reviewsHotel.des: Comfortable beds and clean bathroom. Nothing fancy, but it worked for our short trip.

reviewsHotel.title: Solid business hotel
reviewsHotel.des: Had everything I needed for my work trip: desk, quiet space, and fast Wi-Fi.

reviewsHotel.title: Better than expected
reviewsHotel.des: Nothing too fancy but really comfy. I slept well and breakfast was decent.

reviewsHotel.title: Staff was amazing
reviewsHotel.des: I accidentally booked the wrong date, and they helped me change without charge.

reviewsHotel.title: Could be better
reviewsHotel.des: Elevator was out of service for a day. Besides that, the room was clean and quiet.

reviewsHotel.title: Felt like royalty
reviewsHotel.des: The spa, the pool, the room — everything was five-star. Totally worth every penny!

reviewsHotel.title: Great design
reviewsHotel.des: The interior design and layout were stunning. It felt like staying inside a Pinterest board.

reviewsHotel.title: Modern and sleek
reviewsHotel.des: Modern facilities, great bar area. Loved the rooftop pool!

reviewsHotel.title: Close to everything
reviewsHotel.des: It’s right in the center so it’s easy to walk to shops and restaurants. Room was okay.

reviewsHotel.title: Exactly what I needed
reviewsHotel.des: No frills, just a clean room and good service. I’ll stay again for sure.

reviewsHotel.title: Loved the decor
reviewsHotel.des: The vintage style mixed with comfort. Super photogenic!

reviewsHotel.title: Had some issues
reviewsHotel.des: The air conditioning was a bit weak and check-in took too long. Otherwise, not bad.

reviewsHotel.title: Great for a weekend
reviewsHotel.des: Perfect for a quick escape. The view from our room was stunning, especially at sunset.

reviewsHotel.title: Relaxing stay
reviewsHotel.des: Far from the city noise, this hotel gave me the peace I needed.

reviewsHotel.title: Could be better
reviewsHotel.des: Good location, but the beds were a bit hard and water pressure was low.

reviewsHotel.title: Highly recommend
reviewsHotel.des: Everything was on point — clean rooms, great food, super friendly staff!

reviewsHotel.title: Good vibes
reviewsHotel.des: Feels like a boutique hotel. Really appreciated the small touches in the room.

reviewsHotel.title: Decent value
reviewsHotel.des: Good value for money, nothing luxurious but everything worked well.

reviewsHotel.title: Well managed
reviewsHotel.des: The staff were super responsive and helpful throughout our stay.

reviewsHotel.title: Great escape
reviewsHotel.des: The garden area was beautiful. Spent hours reading under the trees. Super calm.

reviewsHotel.title: Serene environment
reviewsHotel.des: Surprisingly quiet even though it’s close to downtown. Nice breakfast!

reviewsHotel.title: Good short stay
reviewsHotel.des: Was there for one night, everything worked out fine. Room was tidy and warm.

reviewsHotel.title: Fresh hotel
reviewsHotel.des: Feels recently renovated. Sleek design and comfortable bed.

reviewsHotel.title: Good experience
reviewsHotel.des: Good experience overall. Loved the breakfast variety and fast check-out.

rooms.description: This air-conditioned room features large windows and a balcony with views of the city and sea. It contains a sitting area, flat-screen TV, a fridge and tea-and-coffee-making facilities. The bathroom has a shower and toilet.@Maximum occupancy is 2 adults and 1 child under the age of 2 years old in a crib. Please note that extra beds cannot be accommodated in this room type.

Spacious family suite featuring modern decor, city and partial sea view, and a private balcony. Includes a comfortable sitting area, large flat-screen TV, mini fridge, and tea/coffee facilities. The en-suite bathroom offers a rain shower and deluxe amenities.@Maximum occupancy is 2 adults and 2 children under 6 years old. Extra beds are available upon request and subject to availability.

Elegant family suite offering garden and mountain views from the private balcony. Features a spacious layout with two queen beds, a work desk, and a kitchenette. The bathroom includes a walk-in shower, complimentary toiletries, and a hairdryer.@Maximum occupancy is 4 adults. No extra beds allowed but cribs are available for infants under 3 years old.

Cozy standard room with a city view and warm lighting. Features a queen bed, small seating area, flat-screen TV, and complimentary WiFi. Ideal for couples or solo travelers looking for comfort and convenience.@Maximum occupancy is 2 adults. Cribs are available upon request.

Simple and elegant room equipped with essentials for a comfortable stay. Includes a twin bed setup, a work desk, and private bathroom. Perfect for business or short-term travelers.@Maximum occupancy is 2 adults. Extra beds not available.

Bright standard room with large windows and garden view. Comes with modern furniture, a queen-size bed, and minimalist decor. Includes complimentary tea and high-speed internet.@Maximum occupancy is 2 adults and 1 child under 5 sharing existing bedding.
